/*comment*/.path: Represents the path to add custom sys.path for code execution
/*comment*/.provider: AI service provider, supports OpenAI, Google, Mistral, Anthropic, Alibaba, Baidu, Ollama, etc.
/*comment*/.base_url: Base URL for the API (required by some providers)
/*comment*/.model_img: Image processing model name (not implemented, can input anything)
/*comment*/.model_audio: Audio processing model name (not implemented, can input anything)
/*comment*/.simulation_analysis_temprature: Temperature for analysis phase when generating static artifacts
/*comment*/.simulation_generate_code_temprature: Temperature for code generation phase when generating static artifacts
/*comment*/.dumb_analysis_temprature: Temperature for analysis phase in non-intelligent module simulation
/*comment*/.dumb_generate_code_temprature: Temperature for code generation phase in non-intelligent module simulation
/*comment*/.adapter_analysis_temprature: Temperature for adapter generation analysis phase
/*comment*/.adapter_generate_code_temprature: Temperature for adapter generation code phase
/*comment*/.cache_dir: Cache directory, uses default cache directory if not set
/*comment*/.dumb_use_simulation: Whether to simulate code execution as baseline
/*comment*/.dumb_use_v2: Whether to use v2 version of non-intelligent module simulation
/*comment*/.simulation_use_v2: Whether to use v2 version of static executable artifact generation
/*comment*/.exec_use_subprocess: Whether to use python -m subprocess when executing code
/*comment*/.ask: Whether to ask user for confirmation when encountering existing code
/*comment*/.auto_suggest: Whether to automatically generate suggestions after simulation execution
/*comment*/.force_regenerate: Whether to force AI to regenerate some content that could use cache
/*comment*/.record_pkl: Whether to record execution results as pkl files
